citeinfo.origin: University of Washington (UW), Applied Physics Laboratory (APL)
citeinfo.title: Fur Seal Rookery Pup-area and Bull-area Relationships

descript.abstract: This report describes work performed under contract from the National Marine Mammal Lab. To examine the relationship between rookery area and estimated pup (and harem bull) numbers of northern fur seal during the summer on the Pribilof Islands in the Eastern Bering Sea.
descript.purpose: A report on fur seal rookery pup-area and bull-area relationships
